Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your needs. After careful consideration, I propose a price of $13,500 for this exceptional item. This price reflects its high value and the significant benefits it offers. I trust you'll find it a fair offer considering its worth to you is $12,000. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you with our top-quality product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $13,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $13,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
